attributes.action: Use the mony paid back by the banks to lend to small business and property developers decimated by banks unilateral actions with pay back when the business' are in profit.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government must engage in direct loans to small business and small property developers in a simple and straight forward manner that would reflect the government's supports for the banks which put these business' in jeopardy.  All banks are guilty of decimating the small business, even those that did not receive direct help from the government.  Their shares too would have tumbled if the goventment had not rescued the four known banks.
